questions.question: Sugar ………………………… flies.
questions.description: Use the simple present to talk about facts. Sugar is a singular subject, so write attracts.

questions.question: Suspense novels ………………………… a special attention for me.
questions.description: Use the simple present to talk about likes, preferences, tastes etc.

questions.question: The mourners …………………………. in black.
questions.description: The passive form is required here.

questions.question: The defendant ………………………….. by his attorney.
questions.description: The passive form is required here.

questions.question: The audience ………………………… happy with the play.
questions.description: Either a singular or a plural verb can be used after audience.

questions.question: The settlers ………………………… the burning of the fort by destroying a tribal village.
questions.description: To avenge is to take vengeance for.

questions.question: Cats have an aversion …………………………. wet.
questions.description: Here to is a preposition. The ing form is used after preposition to.

questions.question: People who …………………………. too avid for success may miss some of the joys of life.
questions.description: When the relative pronoun is the subject, the verb should agree with its antecedent.

questions.question: The grandparents …………………………… custody of the children.
The salesman kept babbling, until they ……………………… the door.
